title: Video: Tech Top Trumps from Eurobike day one
content:
Video: Tech Top Trumps from Eurobike day one

After a year’s hiatus, Europe’s biggest bike show is back up and running again. Eurobike 2021 is where the cycling industry, press, and fanatics of the sport have assembled for the next few days. Myself and Dave Everett are here to check out all the latest trends and new tech on show.

Amongst the first batch of goodies is the new Shimano Dura-Ace and Ultegra, a new gravel bike from Wilier, and more cargo and e-bikes than you’d see in any self-respecting Dutch city centre. There’s the usual weird and wonderful delights on show, too – anyone for a pedal hydrofoil boat?!

In this first episode, it’s Top Trumps time – Dave and I try to outdo each other with our favourite bits from the first day of wandering the halls.

Read More
author: Ronan Mc Laughlin
